nodes.text: The Borogove was a bulk freighter operated by self-proclaimed master thief Cecil Noone and his gang as of 0 ABY.

While using their bulk freighter Borogove during an attempted grand larceny in 0 ABY, Cecil Noone's gang of thieves got in conflict with a Sector Ranger patrol boat. The Borogove was damaged and the thieves landed it in the Badlands of the planet Kamar for repairs. Noone's gang member Hass Sonax, a Sluissi technician, patched the ship while her partners devoted their time to other activities.

Just when the ship was fixed, Noone received a private message from his employer, gangster Guttu the Hutt, demanding their presence in Guttu's lair in Nar Shaddaa. Noone quickly gathered his team and they took off to meet with Guttu.
The Borogove first appeared in Daniel Wallace's 2000 story The Great Herdship Heist.
